options.text: Ask About Cloth for Lady Moira
Ask About the Wolf in the Wine Cellar.

nodes.text: So you tell me that you don't know anything about the Wolf in the Wine Cellar...
Gregor has not seen a wolf. A wolf in the Wine Cellar would be bad. The Wolf might eat all of Gregor's tasty Drats!

options.text: Ask About the Wolf in the Wine Cellar

nodes.text: Why is there a wolf in the Wine Cellar?
Gregor does not understand Master Shawn. The Wine Cellar has Drats. The Wine Cellar has Proaches. The Wine Cellar has spiders and bugs and other unpleasant creepy-crawlies.
The Wine Cellar has no wolves.
What's with the door marked Very Dangerous?
Gregor wrote warning on that door. Behind that door is a terrifying monster. Gregor has nightmares that the terrifying monster will get out of that door and eat Gregor!
Please, Master Shawn - do not open that door! Gregor is afraid that the terrifying monster will eat Master Shawn for dinner... then eat Gregor for dessert.
I opened the Very Dangerous door and saw a Giant Proach. Is that why you wrote the message on the door?

Please, please, please... Master Shawn, tell me that you ran from the Giant Proach and then locked and sealed the door behind you! The Giant Proach cannot be let out of the room. It will eat all the Drats and then eat Gregor, too!
I didn't let it out of the room...
Oh, very good, Master Shawn! Gregor would be very sad if the Giant Proach ate you. The Headmaster would not let students go into the Wine Cellar again if you were killed there.
What if I were to kill the Giant Proach?

Oh, it would be wonderful if Master Shawn defeated the Giant Proach! Think of all the meat on the Giant Proach gently braised in butter sauce!
Many Ratties would feast for weeks!
But no, Master Shawn, the Giant Proach is too dangerous for you to face. Do not open that door again. Do not let that Giant Proach get loose.
I found these in the dungeon...
Very good, Master Shawn! These Proach parts will be enough to feast on for weeks and weeks.
Very good work, Master Shawn! Please come back if you find any more Drats or Proaches in the dungeon. I'm happy to buy them from you.

nodes.message: Vary the text during the Drat Invasion?

nodes.text: Very good, Master Shawn! These are big drat parts, but Gregor will find something to do with them.

nodes.message: Generic: for Sea Drat parts, Dried Fish, Skatter wings.

nodes.text: Very good, Master Shawn, very good! I'm sure I can find some use for these.
